display_long_description:
Drift V 🏁🔥
BECOME A DRIFT LEGEND IN THE WORLD’S MOST IMMERSIVE VR DRIFTING SIMULATION!

Strap into the ultimate adrenaline rush built exclusively for Meta Quest. With hyper-realistic physics, 9 FREE high-performance drift cars, and 12 levels of tire-shredding action, Drift V transforms your living room into a global drifting arena.

🚗 9 FREE CARS – Unlock & master hyper-realistic drift machines!
🌀 12 LEVELS OF SIDEWAYS ACTION!

✅ TRUE-TO-LIFE PHYSICS:
- Feel every tire scream, counter-steer, and weight shift in VR!
- AI drivers with pro-level drift skills – battle them for dominance!

🎬 CINEMATIC THRILLS: Epic cutscenes celebrate your biggest drifts!
🎮 META QUEST OPTIMIZED: Intuitive controls, smooth locomotion, zero motion sickness!

#VRDrift #DriftingGame#VRCars #RacingSim 

👉 GRAB THE WHEEL!
Only on Meta Horizon Store
Search: 🔎 “Drift V”

Quest 2/3/Pro | Comfort: Comfortable

YOUR DRIFT LEGEND STARTS NOW! 💨🌟
